member.name: T:SwaggerWebAppDemo.Controllers.SampleController
member.summary: Grouping of API Methods for sample/demonstration purposes

member.name: M:SwaggerWebAppDemo.Controllers.SampleController.TestPublicGet
member.summary: Sample get method, used to get a status message
member.returns: Status message. Should be success for all responses

member.name: M:SwaggerWebAppDemo.Controllers.SampleController.TetAuthenticatedGet
member.summary: Sample authenticated get method, used to show a more secure method requiring authentication
member.returns: Status message. should be success for all authenticated responses

member.name: M:SwaggerWebAppDemo.Controllers.SampleController.SearchEmployers(SwaggerWebAppDemo.Models.SearchRequestModel)
member.summary: Method to get a listing of employers with a specified search process
member.remarks: This is a great place to put examples for your users to see what they might need to know.
member.returns: Result object with success/failure indication and any results

member.name: T:SwaggerWebAppDemo.Models.SearchRequestModel
member.summary: Model class for submitting search requests into the API methods

member.name: P:SwaggerWebAppDemo.Models.SearchRequestModel.SearchCriteria
member.summary: The search critera that should be used.
member.remarks: Can use * or _ for wildcards (Note, not shown)

member.name: P:SwaggerWebAppDemo.Models.SearchRequestModel.IncludeDeleted
member.summary: Should the search include deleted records.

member.name: T:SwaggerWebAppDemo.Models.EmployerSearchResultModel
